definition: infant's part in opera, usually played by child actor

sentences.english: Studies of adults show what's known as a baby-face bias.
sentences.chinese: 研究成年人知道什么事娃娃脸偏见。

sentences.english: This little blond moppet, gentle and kind and interested in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这个金发的小娃娃，温顺而友好，对世界充满了兴趣。

sentences.english: As the recession deepens, Barbie’s conservative values are also back in vogue.
sentences.chinese: 随经济萧条恶化，芭比娃娃的保守价值也重振雄风。

sentences.english: Once home, Moskvina dressed the bodies up as dolls.
sentences.chinese: 回到家之后，他把这些尸体打扮得跟娃娃一样。

sentences.english: Wire doll under its small shape like a large thin silk covering of the baby, hence the name.
sentences.chinese: 丝娃娃因其形状上大下小犹如薄丝包的婴儿，故名。

sentences.english: But I would like a Bratz doll as well because they are more into fashion.
sentences.chinese: 但是我也喜欢Bratz娃娃，它们更时尚。

sentences.english: They hope it will bring a modicum of respect to Chihuahuas everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望这能带来人们对各地吉娃娃狗的一点尊重。

sentences.english: There are a hundred lovely children on both sides of a pair of tiny little snuff-boxes.
sentences.chinese: 在一对微型鼻烟壶内面，画有一百个可爱的娃娃。

sentences.english: Video Girl doll from Barbie comes with built-in digital camera.
sentences.chinese: 芭比娃娃的视频女孩，带有内置数码相机。

sentences.english: The girl clasped the doll tightly.
sentences.chinese: 小姑娘紧紧抱着洋娃娃。

sentences.english: Or hug your sadness like an eyeless doll.
sentences.chinese: 或者像个没有眼珠的阴郁的娃娃，抱着忧伤。

sentences.english: Ponine and Zelma will not let me play with their dolls.
sentences.chinese: 潘妮和兹玛都不许我玩她们的娃娃。

sentences.english: My mom caught a glimpse of the 3-foot porcelain doll before I did.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈先于我看到了一个3英尺高的瓷娃娃。

sentences.english: One day Helenremembered the doll she had broken.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，海伦想起了她摔碎的玩具娃娃。

sentences.english: The old man with a baby-face looks very young.
sentences.chinese: 那个长着一张娃娃脸的老人看起来很年轻。

sentences.english: Happy sharing your doll gifts meaning and experience.
sentences.chinese: 分享你的洋娃娃礼物快乐意义和经验。

definition: mythological daughter of Fiery Emperor 炎帝[Yan2 di4] who turned into bird Jingwei 精衛|精卫[Jing1 wei4] after drowning
erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]
